description: FrameMaker documents support text, raster graphics, and vector graphics, including .SVG images. Pages can be saved as .PDF files for better compatibility with other systems.
NOTE: FrameMaker only supports .FM documents created in FrameMaker 3 or later.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .fm file in Autodesk FeatureCAM Ultimate 2022
images.caption: FM file open in Autodesk FeatureCAM Ultimate 2022
